if(WIN32)
	set(SPIRV_REFLECT_SOURCE_FILE $ENV{VULKAN_SDK}/Source/SPIRV-Reflect/spirv_reflect.c)
	set(SPIRV_REFLECT_INCLUDE_DIR $ENV{VULKAN_SDK}/Source/SPIRV-Reflect)
	string(REGEX REPLACE "\\\\" "/" SPIRV_REFLECT_SOURCE_FILE ${SPIRV_REFLECT_SOURCE_FILE})
	string(REGEX REPLACE "\\\\" "/" SPIRV_REFLECT_INCLUDE_DIR ${SPIRV_REFLECT_INCLUDE_DIR})
else()
	set(SPIRV_REFLECT_SOURCE_FILE $ENV{VULKAN_SDK}/include/SPIRV-Reflect/spirv_reflect.c)
	set(SPIRV_REFLECT_INCLUDE_DIR $ENV{VULKAN_SDK}/include/SPIRV-Reflect)
endif()

add_library(spirv-reflect ${SPIRV_REFLECT_SOURCE_FILE})
target_include_directories(spirv-reflect PUBLIC ${SPIRV_REFLECT_INCLUDE_DIR})
